title: Best of The Program | Guest: Christopher Rufo | 7/27/20
description:
Glenn’s family caught the coronavirus. How has hydroxychloroquine become political when doctors say it actually works? John Roberts abandoned the Constitution again, refusing to take up a clear First Amendment case. City Journal contributing editor Christopher Rufo joins with the latest on how the city of Seattle is responding to chaos: by looking to abolish prisons. Will the coin shortage usher in a cashless society? Sand and aluminum shortages are also on the horizon.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
